w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach basic irregular plural nouns by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases: people, children, sheep, mice, deer, men, women, man, woman, person, child, mouse,
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for irregular plural nouns
Spell and pronounce common associated words
Use sets of words in complete sentences
Word List: people, children, sheep, mice, deer
This slide will always be the
-branded opener slide that the teacher will display as the student enters the classroom.
